quote_last: Simon is coming round. His girlfriend has gone back to her husband. Thank God stayed at home to receive chucked friends in manner of Queen of Hearts or Soup Kitchen. But thatâ€™s just the kind of person I am: liking to love others.
title: Bridget Jones's Diary
author: Helen Fielding

quote_first: Colonel Putnis knocked on his door at
quote_last: The car was waiting in front of the hotel, and they drove through the dark streets to police headquarters. It had grown much colder during the evening, and the city was almost deserted.
title: The Dogs of Riga
author: Henning Mankell
